subSections.title: Descendants
Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|足袋|たび}}: [[tabi]]
* {{ja-r|寝袋|ねぶくろ}}: [[sleeping bag]]
* {{ja-r|手袋|てぶくろ}}: [[glove]]

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ふくろ}}

# a [[bag]]; a [[sack]]; a [[pouch]]
# a [[segment]] in a fruit such as an [[orange]]
# an [[organ]] whose form is like that of a bag
